text: The Benefits of Wisdom
My child, if you will receive\f + \fr 2:1 \ft Or “take, seize” \f* my sayings,
and hide my commands with you,
\add in order\add* to incline your ear toward wisdom,
\add then\add* you shall apply your heart to understanding.
For if you cry out for understanding,\f + \fr 2:3 \ft Or “call to understanding” \f*
\add if\add* you lift\f + \fr 2:3 \ft Or “carry, give” \f* your voice for insight,
if you seek her like silver
and search her out ⸤like treasure⸥,\f + \fr 2:4 \ft Literally “like the treasures” \f*
then you will understand the fear of Yahweh,
and the knowledge of God you will find.
For Yahweh will give wisdom;
from his mouth \add come\add* knowledge and understanding.
For the upright, he stores\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Or “hides, keeps” \f* sound judgment, a shield for those who walk uprightly,
\add in order\add* to guard paths of justice
and keep\f + \fr 2:8 \ft Or “preserve, guard, watch” \f* the way of his faithful \add ones\add*.
Then you will understand righteousness and justice
and uprightness—every good course—
for wisdom will enter your heart,
and knowledge will be pleasing to your soul.\f + \fr 2:10 \ft Or “inner self” \f*
Discretion will watch over you;
understanding will protect you,
\add in order\add* to deliver you from the way of evil,\f + \fr 2:12 \ft Or “evildoer” \f*
from a man who speaks devious things—
those who forsake the paths of uprightness
to walk in ways of darkness,
those who are happy to do evil,
\add for\add* they delight in \add the\add* deviousness of evil,
⸤who are crooked in their ways⸥,\f + \fr 2:15 \ft Literally “that \fq in \ft their ways are crooked” \f*
and devious in their paths;
\add in order\add* to deliver you from a strange woman,
from a foreign woman \add who\add* flatters\f + \fr 2:16 \ft Or “makes smooth” \f* \add with\add* her sayings,
she who forsakes the partner of her youth
and has forgotten the covenant of her God,
for her house sinks to death,
and to the dead\f + \fr 2:18 \ft Or “Rephaim” \f* are her paths.
\add Of\add* all who go to her, none shall return,
nor do they reach paths of life.
So that you will walk on the road of those who are good,
and the paths of those who are righteous you shall keep.
For those who are upright will dwell \add in the\add* land,\f + \fr 2:21 \ft Or “earth” \f*
and those who are blameless\f + \fr 2:21 \ft Or “innocent” \f* will remain in it.
And those who are wicked will be cut off from the land,
and those who are treacherous will be uprooted from it.
